newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 7.33 pct at Italy mark repo.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 7.33 pct at Italy mark repo.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 3.0 billion mark Bank of Italy one-month repurchase tender was 7.33 percent against 7.25 percent at the previous foreign currency tender which was for three months, the Bank said.
The average indicative rate was 7.35 percent from 7.26 percent at a previous tender for $4.0 billion on February 24.
A statement said the tender was fully subscribed and the funds assigned at a minimum 3.49 forward points above the 996.25 lire per mark floor set by the Bank of Italy.
The Bank received 25 bids of which nine were met in full and two in part.
